sentences.en: A man - like animal that was covered a dingy, gray hair.
sentences.cn: 这种类人生物具有灰色外表和毛发.

sentences.en: At Barnes the river is muddy, dingy and tidal.
sentences.cn: 在巴恩斯,河水是那么浑浊 、 肮脏、多潮汐.

sentences.en: Charles looked round him at the dingy smoke - discolored walls, the worm - eaten staircase.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯环视被烟熏黑的墙壁和虫蛀的楼梯.

sentences.en: Charles looked round him at the dingy smoke - discoloured walls, the wormeaten staircase.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯看到墙壁到处是烟熏的痕迹, 给虫蛀厂的楼梯.

sentences.en: He set his alarm for three and stretched out on the dingy bed.
sentences.cn: 他把闹钟开到三点钟,然后在那张邋遢的床上躺下.

sentences.en: He was living alone in a dingy bedsit in London.
sentences.cn: 他独自一人住在伦敦一间昏暗的客卧两用出租屋里。

sentences.en: In one of buildings Feliks rented a dingy room from an Irish woman called Bridget.
sentences.cn: 在其中一幢楼房里,费利克从一位名叫布里奇特的爱尔兰妇女那里租了一间昏暗的房间.

sentences.en: It was a dingy affair -- wooden, dusty, hard.
sentences.cn: 这是一间阴暗的房间 -- 木地板, 满屋灰尘, 床铺很硬.

sentences.en: It was a dingy stream; but upon this bright, spirited morning everything was become beautiful.
sentences.cn: 这条河本来很脏; 可是在晴朗 、 清爽的早晨,一切都显得美丽动人.

sentences.en: It was a street of dingy houses huddled together.
sentences.cn: 这是一条挤满了破旧房子的街巷.

sentences.en: Opposite this grandeur, on the Surrey side, were the dingy warehouses and factories of Lambeth.
sentences.cn: 在这壮观的景物对面, 在萨里这一边, 是兰贝斯的脏污的栈房和一家家工厂.

sentences.en: Shaw took me to his rather dingy office.
sentences.cn: 肖带我去了他那个陈旧昏暗的办公室。

sentences.en: The doomed leaves pass through on their way to dingy , and yellow, and red.
sentences.cn: 叶子注定要由暗淡而泛黄, 然后变红.

sentences.en: The poor were housed in dingy, rotting buildings.
sentences.cn: 穷人住在昏暗的朽烂的房子里.

sentences.en: Then he looked about upon a dingy, moth - eaten hotel lobby.
sentences.cn: 这时他朝这个阴暗 、 破烂的旅馆门厅四周看了看.

words.tran_cn: 衣衫褴褛地；肮脏地；昏暗地

trans.tran_en: dark, dirty, and in bad condition
